analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: This is stated in the following:🔽Emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, non-production, non-cessation, and so on,

original: stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus pa /
analyzed: stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras bsdus pa /
translated: which includes the terms,🔽non-affliction, non-purification, non-entity, essence, non-support, and the characteristic of space,

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / rten med pa dang / nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de drug dang / chos nyid rnam par 'khrug pa med pa dang /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / ngo bo nyid dang / rten med pa dang / nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de drug dang / chos nyid rnam par 'khrug pa med pa dang /
translated: and the non-disturbance of reality,

original: 'du mi byed pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par bcu drug gis ji lta ba bzhin du lam shes pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na shes pa'i mtshan nyid lam shes pa nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: 'du mi byed pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / rab tu dbye ba dang / mtshan nyid med pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par bcu drug gis ji lta ba bzhin du lam shes pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na shes pa'i mtshan nyid lam shes pa nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: The sixteen aspects of the knowledge of the path are indicated by the sixteen aspects of the knowledge of the path, which are called non-compounded, non-conceptual, non-differentiated, and signless.

original: de'i 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo nas /
analyzed: de'i 'og tu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo nas /
translated: After that, through the aspect of omniscience,

original: de ni nyid kyi chos rten nas //
analyzed: de ni nyid kyi chos rten nas //
translated: It is based on one's own Dharma,🔽The place, respect,🔽Superiority, pleasing,🔽Worship of that, non-action,🔽Omniscience,

original: gnas dang gus par bya ba dang // bla ma nyid dang mnyes pa dang // de la mchod dang byed med dang // kun du 'jug mkhyen gang yin dang // ma mthong ston par mdzad pa dang // 'jig rten stong nyid rnam pa dang // brjod dang shes mdzad mngon sum mdzad //
analyzed: gnas dang gus par bya ba dang // bla ma nyid dang mnyes pa dang // de la mchod dang byed med dang // kun du 'jug mkhyen gang yin dang // ma mthong ston par mdzad pa dang // 'jig rten stong nyid rnam pa dang // brjod dang shes mdzad mngon sum mdzad //
translated: Teaching without seeing,🔽The aspects of emptiness in the world,🔽Making known what is expressed, making it manifest,

original: bsam mi khyab dang zhi nyid ston //
analyzed: bsam mi khyab dang zhi nyid ston //
translated: Teaching the inconceivable and peace,

original: 'jig rten 'du shes 'gog pa la //
analyzed: 'jig rten 'du shes 'gog pa la //
translated: In the cessation of worldly perceptions,

original: rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni //🔽shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
analyzed: rnam pa kun mkhyen tshul la ni // shes pa'i mtshan nyid ces bshad do //
translated: The mode of knowing all aspects

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: is explained as the characteristic of knowledge.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi chos la mngon par brten nas gnas pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang mchod pa dang byed pa med pa nyid dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi chos la mngon par brten nas gnas pa dang / gus par bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / mnyes par bya ba dang mchod pa dang byed pa med pa nyid dang / thams cad du 'gro ba dang /
translated: Thus, the Tathāgata, based on the Dharma itself, abides, is revered, is respected, is pleased, is worshipped, is without activity, and is all-pervading.

original: ma mthong ba'i don ston pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid du brjod pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid du shes par mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid du mthong bar mdzad pa dang /
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i don ston pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid du brjod pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid du shes par mdzad pa dang / 'jig rten stong pa nyid du mthong bar mdzad pa dang /
translated: He teaches the meaning that is not seen, the aspect of the emptiness of the world, the expression of the emptiness of the world, the understanding of the emptiness of the world, and the vision of the emptiness of the world.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du ston pa dang / zhi ba nyid du ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'gog pa dang / 'du shes 'gog pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag bcu @111b drug gis ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na /
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du ston pa dang / zhi ba nyid du ston pa dang / 'jig rten 'gog pa dang / 'du shes 'gog pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams kyi shes pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag bcu @111b drug gis ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na /
translated: The sixteen aspects of knowledge of the four noble truths, such as impermanence, are illustrated by the sixteen aspects of knowledge of the applications of the knowledge of all aspects, such as the knowledge that shows the four noble truths to be impermanent, painful, empty, and insubstantial, the knowledge that shows them to be calm, sublime, subtle, and transcendent, the knowledge that shows them to be cessation, signless, wishless, and void, and the knowledge that shows them to be inconceivable, peaceful, worldly, and the cessation of discrimination.

original: shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no //
analyzed: shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bsdus pa yin no //
translated: Thus, the knowledge of all aspects is included in the definition of knowledge.

original: de ltar bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dgus shes pa'i mtshan nyid spyi'i ngo bo nyid du brjod nas /
analyzed: de ltar bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa dgus shes pa'i mtshan nyid spyi'i ngo bo nyid du brjod nas /
translated: Having thus described the general nature of the definition of knowledge in nine intermediate verses,

original: shes pa'i rnam pas yongs su bcad pa rnams kyi khyad par shes par bya ba yin pas shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'og tu bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pas khyad par gyi mtshan nyid /
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pas yongs su bcad pa rnams kyi khyad par shes par bya ba yin pas shes pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'og tu bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pas khyad par gyi mtshan nyid /
translated: the specific characteristics of the divisions of knowledge should be understood. Therefore, after the definition of knowledge, the specific characteristics are presented in an intermediate verse.🔽The specific characteristics are

original: bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyis //
analyzed: bsam mi khyab sogs khyad par gyis //
translated: inconceivable, etc.

original: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can //
analyzed: khyad zhugs bden pa'i spyod yul can //
translated: It is distinguished, having the domain of the truth.

original: skad cig ma ni bcu drug gis //
analyzed: skad cig ma ni bcu drug gis //
translated: By means of the sixteen instants,

original: khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
analyzed: khyad par mtshan nyid bshad pa yin //
translated: The defining mark of distinction is explained.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i yul can chos dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid bcu drug gi sa lam shes pa nyid la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dag mtshon
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te / bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / mi mnyam pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gyis khyad par du byas pa'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i yul can chos dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang shes pa'i mtshan nyid bcu drug gi sa lam shes pa nyid la sogs pa'i sbyor ba dag mtshon
translated: This is stated.🔽The defining mark of distinction is the knowledge of the path of the sixteen instants of perseverance and knowledge of the doctrine and subsequent knowledge, having the domain of the truths of suffering and so on, distinguished by the distinctions of inconceivability, inequality, and so on.

original: pas na khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: pas na khyad par gyi mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: It is the defining mark of distinction because it indicates the applications of the knowledge of the path of the sixteen instants of perseverance and knowledge of the doctrine and subsequent knowledge, having the domain of the truths of suffering and so on, distinguished by the distinctions of inconceivability, inequality, and so on.

original: yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa'i khyad par gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are the distinctions of inconceivability and so on?

original: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum po //
analyzed: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum po //
translated: The three verses in the middle state:🔽Inconceivable, unequal,

original: bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang // gzhal dang bgrang las yang dag 'das //
analyzed: bsam mi khyab dang mi mnyam dang // gzhal dang bgrang las yang dag 'das //
translated: Beyond measure and number,

original: 'phags pa kun sdud mkhas pa yis //
analyzed: 'phags pa kun sdud mkhas pa yis //
translated: The wise gather all the aryas

original: rig bya thun mong min shes nyid //
analyzed: rig bya thun mong min shes nyid //
translated: And know the uncommon object of knowledge.

original: shes myur bri dang gang med dang // sgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang // dmigs pa rten dang bcas pa dang // mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang // ro myang med dang khyad par ni //
analyzed: shes myur bri dang gang med dang // sgrub dang yang dag 'grub pa dang // dmigs pa rten dang bcas pa dang // mtha' dag pa dang yongs 'dzin dang // ro myang med dang khyad par ni //
translated: absence of relishing, and distinction,

original: bcu drug bdag nyid shes bya ste //🔽gang gis lam ni gzhan dag las //
analyzed: bcu drug bdag nyid shes bya ste // gang gis lam ni gzhan dag las //
translated: should be known as the sixteen aspects.🔽By which the path is superior to other paths,

original: khyad du 'phags pas khyad par lam //
analyzed: khyad du 'phags pas khyad par lam //
translated: it is the special path.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pas legs par yongs su bzung ba'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / mi mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
analyzed: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sogs pas legs par yongs su bzung ba'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid dang / mi mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhal ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang / bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa dang /
translated: By the power of wisdom well-grasped by the Perfectly Awakened Ones and so forth, the inconceivable, the unequaled, the transcendence of measure, the transcendence of enumeration,

original: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad sdud pa dang / skyes bu mkhas pas @112a * //
analyzed: 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad sdud pa dang / skyes bu mkhas pas @112a * //
translated: the inclusion of all noble persons, and the wise

original: rig par bya ba nyid dang / nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pa dang / rang gi lugs la ltos pa'i mngon par shes pa shin tu myur ba'i shes pa dang / kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la brten pa'i chos thams cad bri ba med pa dang /
analyzed: rig par bya ba nyid dang / nyan thos la sogs pa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i dngos po yongs su shes pa dang / rang gi lugs la ltos pa'i mngon par shes pa shin tu myur ba'i shes pa dang / kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa la brten pa'i chos thams cad bri ba med pa dang /
translated: It is the knowledge of things that are not the domain of śrāvakas and so on. It is the knowledge that is very swift in terms of the superknowledges in one’s own system. It is the nature of all phenomena that are based on the conventional and ultimate truths, which are neither diminished nor increased.

original: gang ba med pa'i ngo bo dang / 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu rab tu sgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i sbyor bas bskal pa du mar bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
analyzed: gang ba med pa'i ngo bo dang / 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu rab tu sgrub pa dang / yang dag pa'i sbyor bas bskal pa du mar bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
translated: It is the accomplishment of the six perfections, such as generosity, through the purity of the three spheres. It is the accomplishment of the merit and wisdom that are accomplished over many eons through correct application.

original: rnam par mi rtog par chos thams cad la dmigs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid byang chub sems dpa'i rten dang / smon lam la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis thabs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /🔽mngon par zhen pa'i ro myang ba med pa dang bcu drug gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog par chos thams cad la dmigs pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid byang chub sems dpa'i rten dang / smon lam la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu'i tshogs pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis thabs kyis yongs su bzung ba dang / mngon par zhen pa'i ro myang ba med pa dang bcu drug gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni /
translated: The path of no more learning is the state of buddhahood, the result of the path of meditation.

original: go rims bzhin du sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i skad cig ma rnams kyi khyad par yin te /🔽gang gis nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam rnams las byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lam shes pa nyid la sogs pa gnyis ni /
analyzed: go rims bzhin du sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i skad cig ma rnams kyi khyad par yin te / gang gis nyan thos la sogs pa'i lam rnams las byang chub sems dpa' la sogs pa'i lam shes pa nyid la sogs pa gnyis ni /
translated: The path of seeing is the sixteen moments of the path of seeing that are the antidotes to the four truths, such as impermanence and so on.🔽The path of meditation is the path of meditation that is the antidote to the afflictions of the three realms.

original: khyad par gyi lam yin par khyad zhugs so //
analyzed: khyad par gyi lam yin par khyad zhugs so //
translated: The path of no more learning is the state of buddhahood, the result of the path of meditation.

original: de'i phyir de dag gi ni ji skad bshad pa'i khyad par dang bral ba'i mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyis go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
analyzed: de'i phyir de dag gi ni ji skad bshad pa'i khyad par dang bral ba'i mngon par zhen pa la sogs pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid kyis go sla ba'i phyir ma bshad do //
translated: Therefore, their characteristics are not explained, because their manifest clinging and so forth, which are devoid of the previously mentioned distinctions, are easy to understand.

original: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par bcad pa rnams kyi byed pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: khyad par gyi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par bcad pa rnams kyi byed pa gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the function of the distinctions that have been eliminated?

original: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
analyzed: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyis byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
translated: The two intermediate verses explain the characteristic of function.🔽Beneficial, blissful, protective,🔽and a refuge for humans,🔽a support, a friend, an island,

original: phan dang bde dang skyob pa dang // mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang // gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni //🔽yongs 'dren pa zhes bya ba dang // lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyi //
analyzed: phan dang bde dang skyob pa dang // mi rnams kyi ni skyabs dag dang // gnas dang dpung gnyen gling dang ni // yongs 'dren pa zhes bya ba dang // lhun gyis grub dang theg gsum gyi //
translated: and a guide,🔽spontaneously accomplishing,🔽not actualizing the fruits of the three vehicles,

original: 'bras bu mngon sum mi byed bdag / tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
analyzed: 'bras bu mngon sum mi byed bdag / tha ma rten gyi mdzad pa ste //
translated: the final function is the support,

original: 'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
analyzed: 'di ni byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin //
translated: this is the characteristic of function.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: It is said.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i phan pa dang / tshe 'di'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal med pa'i rnam @112b par smin pa ma yin pa'i chos nyid nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i phan pa dang / tshe 'di'i bde ba dang / sdug bsngal med pa'i rnam @112b par smin pa ma yin pa'i chos nyid nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis /
translated: The three functions of the knowledge of paths are the benefit of the future, the happiness of this life, and the attainment of the nature of phenomena that is not subject to suffering.

original: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi phan pa la sogs pa'i byed pa gsum mo //
analyzed: thams cad shes pa nyid kyi phan pa la sogs pa'i byed pa gsum mo //
translated: The three functions of the knowledge of all aspects are benefit, and so on.

original: gtan du phan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bzlog pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / rang dang gzhan gyi don rtogs pa'i rten gyi ngo bo dang / gzhan gyi don sgrub pa dang /
analyzed: gtan du phan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bzlog pa dang / 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa dang / rang dang gzhan gyi don rtogs pa'i rten gyi ngo bo dang / gzhan gyi don sgrub pa dang /
translated: The seven functions of the knowledge of paths are the attainment of the nature of the support, which is the benefit that lasts forever, the reversal of the causes of suffering, the realization of the equality of samsara and nirvana, the realization of one’s own and others’ benefit, the accomplishment of others’ welfare,🔽the spontaneous engagement in the welfare of sentient beings, and the non-actualization of the result of definite emergence in the three vehicles.

original: sems can gyi don lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa dang / theg pa gsum gyi nges par 'byung ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par nye bar sgrub pa'i don gyis lam shes pa nyid kyi skyabs la sogs pa'i byed pa bdun no //
analyzed: sems can gyi don lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa dang / theg pa gsum gyi nges par 'byung ba'i 'bras bu mngon sum du mi byed pa zhes bya ba 'di rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par nye bar sgrub pa'i don gyis lam shes pa nyid kyi skyabs la sogs pa'i byed pa bdun no //
translated: The seven functions of the knowledge of paths are the attainment of the nature of the support, which is the benefit that lasts forever, the reversal of the causes of suffering, the realization of the equality of samsara and nirvana, the realization of one’s own and others’ benefit, the accomplishment of others’ welfare,🔽the spontaneous engagement in the welfare of sentient beings, and the non-actualization of the result of definite emergence in the three vehicles.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos thams cad ston pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos thams cad ston pa nye bar bsgrub pa'i don gyis /
translated: The meaning of the term is that it is the basis for the attainment of the gnosis of omniscience, which reveals all phenomena.

original: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ni rten gyi mdzad pa gcig ste /
analyzed: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ni rten gyi mdzad pa gcig ste /
translated: The one action of support for the knowledge of all aspects is the accomplishment of the teaching of all dharmas.

original: de ltar na byed pa'i rnam pa dag gis ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na byed pa'i rnam pa dag gis ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gsum gyi sbyor ba dag mtshon pas na byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: Thus, the three knowledges are indicated by the aspects of action, and so the knowledge of all aspects has the characteristic of action.

original: byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shes par byas pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shes par byas pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid gang yin zhe na /
translated: What is the nature of those who are made to understand by the characteristic of action?

original: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid /
analyzed: bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gsum gyis ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid /
translated: The characteristic of nature is indicated by three verses in the middle.

original: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang // mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang // dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang // ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang // mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang // dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang // mi mthun thogs pa med dang de //
analyzed: nyon mongs rtags dang mtshan ma dang // mi mthun phyogs dang gnyen po dang // dben dang dka' dang nges pa dang // ched du bya dang mi dmigs dang // mngon par zhen pa bkag pa dang // dmigs pa zhes bya gang yin dang // mi mthun thogs pa med dang de //
translated: The cessation of clinging,🔽And what is called the object,🔽The adverse factors, the unobstructed, and that🔽Without basis, without going, without arising,🔽And the non-apprehension of suchness,

original: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang // de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang // ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid //
analyzed: gzhi med 'gro med skye med dang // de bzhin nyid ni mi dmigs dang // ngo bo nyid bcu drug bdag nyid //
translated: The essence itself of sixteen.

original: mtshon cha lta bur mtshon pas na //
analyzed: mtshon cha lta bur mtshon pas na //
translated: Because it is illustrated like a weapon,

original: mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin //
analyzed: mtshan nyid bzhi par bzhed pa yin //
translated: It is accepted as having four characteristics.

original: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Thus it is said.

original: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / de'i rtags lus kyi gnas ngan len dang / de'i mtshan ma tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa la sogs pa dang / 'dod chags dang 'dod chags med pa la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs dang gnyen po dag stong pa nyid kyis thams cad shes pa nyid kyi dben pa'i ngo bo nyid bzhi'o //🔽don dam par med pa'i sems can mya ngan las @113a * //

original: bzla bar dka' ba dang / theg pa gzhan du mi ltung ba'i mtshan nyid kyi mtha' gcig tu nges pa dang / yun ring po nas bsgrub par bya ba mchog nyid kyi ched du bya ba dang / bsgom par bya ba dang sgom pa po'i chos mi dmigs pa dang /

original: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa gang yin zhe na /

analyzed: gzugs la sogs las ldog sogs rtags //

analyzed: rnam pa nyi shur brjod pa yis // nges 'byed yan lag la gnas pa'i //

analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid 'di // zhes bya ba gsungs te /

analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa las ldog pa dang / the tshom med pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa /
translated: The signs of turning away from form and so on, and the aspects of being free of doubt and so on,

analyzed: rnam pa nyi shus nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa la gnas pa rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya ba yin no //
translated: One should know the characteristics of irreversibility of those who are in the stages conducive to penetration by the twenty aspects.

original: yang ldog pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de dag gang yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ldog pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid de dag gang yin zhe na /
translated: What are the characteristics of turning away, etc.?

original: de dag bstan pa'i phyir bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa drug po /
analyzed: de dag bstan pa'i phyir bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa drug po /
translated: In order to teach them, there are six intermediate verses:🔽Turning away from form, etc.,🔽without doubt, without weariness, without exhaustion,

original: gzugs la sogs las ldog pa dang // the tshom mi ngal zad pa dang // bdag nyid dge ba la gnas shing //🔽gzhan dag de la 'god pa dang // gzhan gyi rten can sbyin sogs dang // zab mo'i don la'ang som nyi med //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs las ldog pa dang // the tshom mi ngal zad pa dang // bdag nyid dge ba la gnas shing // gzhan dag de la 'god pa dang // gzhan gyi rten can sbyin sogs dang // zab mo'i don la'ang som nyi med //
translated: one’s own abiding in virtue,🔽establishing others in that,🔽generosity, etc., based on others,

original: byams lus sogs dang sgrib pa ni //
analyzed: byams lus sogs dang sgrib pa ni //
translated: and also being without doubt about the profound meaning.🔽Non-association with the five types of obscurations,🔽the destruction of all latent tendencies,

original: rnam pa lnga dang mi 'grogs dang // bag la nyal kun 'joms pa dang // dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang // gos la sogs pa @115a * //
analyzed: rnam pa lnga dang mi 'grogs dang // bag la nyal kun 'joms pa dang // dran pa dang ni shes bzhin dang // gos la sogs pa @115a * //
translated: mindfulness, vigilance,🔽cleanliness of clothing, etc.,

original: gtsang ba dang // lus la srin bu rnams mi 'byung //
analyzed: gtsang ba dang // lus la srin bu rnams mi 'byung //
translated: and the absence of parasites in the body.

original: gya gyu med sems sbyangs pa ni //
analyzed: gya gyu med sems sbyangs pa ni //
translated: A purified mind without crookedness,

original: len dang ser sna med sogs dang // chos nyid ldan par 'gro nyid dang // sems can don du dmyal tshol dang // gzhan gyis dkri bar mi btub dag / lam gzhan nye bar ston bdud la //🔽bdud ces bya bar rtogs pa dang // sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i spyod pa ste //
analyzed: len dang ser sna med sogs dang // chos nyid ldan par 'gro nyid dang // sems can don du dmyal tshol dang // gzhan gyis dkri bar mi btub dag / lam gzhan nye bar ston bdud la // bdud ces bya bar rtogs pa dang // sangs rgyas dgyes pa'i spyod pa ste //
translated: and not being led astray by others,🔽are the twenty signs

original: rtags ni nyi shu de dag gis //
analyzed: rtags ni nyi shu de dag gis //
translated: of the path of preparation.🔽The path of preparation is the stage of heat, peak,

original: drod dang rtse mo bzod bcas dang // chos mchog rnams la gnas pa ni //
analyzed: drod dang rtse mo bzod bcas dang // chos mchog rnams la gnas pa ni //
translated: patience, and the supreme mundane state.

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las mi ldog / ces bya ba gsungs te /
translated: Those abiding in them do not turn away from complete enlightenment.

original: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i chos las ldog pa dang / shes nas dad pa thob pas the tshom zad pa dang / smon lam grub pas log par lta ba dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dags dang / dud 'gror skye ba dang /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i chos las ldog pa dang / shes nas dad pa thob pas the tshom zad pa dang / smon lam grub pas log par lta ba dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dags dang / dud 'gror skye ba dang /
translated: Turning away from phenomena such as form through the absence of inherent nature, eliminating doubt through attaining faith through knowledge, eliminating wrong views through fulfilling one's aspirations, and eliminating rebirth as a hell being, hungry ghost, or animal through not being led astray by others are the four signs of the path of preparation.

original: sangs rgyas kyi bka' mi thos pa dang / yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa'i dngos po dang / lha tshe ring por skye ba zhes bya ba mi khom pa brgyad zad pa dang /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi bka' mi thos pa dang / yul mtha' 'khob tu skye ba dang / dbang po ma tshang ba dang / glen pa dang / lkugs pa'i dngos po dang / lha tshe ring por skye ba zhes bya ba mi khom pa brgyad zad pa dang /
translated: The eight unfavorable conditions are exhausted: not hearing the words of the Buddha, being born in a border region, having incomplete faculties, being stupid or mute, being born as a long-lived god, and being born in a place where there is no buddha.

original: snying rjes bdag dang gzhan dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba dang / bdag dang gzhan du brje ba nyid kyis sems can gzhan gyi yul la yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa dang / chos yang dag par rtogs pas zab mo'i don la yang som nyi mi byed pa dang /
analyzed: snying rjes bdag dang gzhan dge ba'i chos la sbyor ba dang / bdag dang gzhan du brje ba nyid kyis sems can gzhan gyi yul la yongs su bsngos pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa dang / chos yang dag par rtogs pas zab mo'i don la yang som nyi mi byed pa dang /
translated: The bodhisattvas' generosity and so forth are dedicated to the objects of other sentient beings by means of exchanging oneself with others and by means of applying oneself and others to virtuous dharmas through compassion.

original: gzhan la phan pa nyid du zhugs pas byams pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas sgrib pa lnga po /
analyzed: gzhan la phan pa nyid du zhugs pas byams pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pas sgrib pa lnga po /
translated: The bodhisattvas' actions of body, speech, and mind are loving because they are engaged in benefiting others.

original: 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tshom dag dang mi 'grogs pa dang / gnyen po rnam par bsgoms pa nyid kyis ma rig pa la sogs pa'i bag la nyal ba thams cad 'joms pa dang /
analyzed: 'dod pa la 'dun pa dang / gnod sems dang / gnyid dang / rmugs pa dang / rgod pa dang / 'gyod pa dang / the tshom dag dang mi 'grogs pa dang / gnyen po rnam par bsgoms pa nyid kyis ma rig pa la sogs pa'i bag la nyal ba thams cad 'joms pa dang /
translated: It is the destroyer of all latent propensities of ignorance and so on, since it is the cultivation of their antidotes.🔽It is endowed with mindfulness and vigilance, since it is always in equipoise.🔽It is pure in its use of clothing and so on, since it is pure in its conduct.

original: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyis dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang / gtsang sbra kun du spyod pa nyid kyis gos la sogs pa yongs su spyod pa gtsang ba zhes bya ba rnam pa bcu gcig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las mngon par 'phags pa nyid kyis lus la srin bu'i @115b rigs brgyad khri mi 'byung ba dang /
analyzed: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa nyid kyis dran pa dang shes bzhin dang ldan pa dang / gtsang sbra kun du spyod pa nyid kyis gos la sogs pa yongs su spyod pa gtsang ba zhes bya ba rnam pa bcu gcig dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba 'jig rten las mngon par 'phags pa nyid kyis lus la srin bu'i @115b rigs brgyad khri mi 'byung ba dang /
translated: It is free from the eighty four thousand types of parasites, since its roots of virtue are exalted above the mundane.

original: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pas sems gya gyu med pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa la mi lta ba nyid kyis phyag dar khrod pa nyid la sogs pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par len pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bsgrubs pas de dag dang 'gal ba ser sna dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la sogs pa med pa dang /
analyzed: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pas sems gya gyu med pa dang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti la sogs pa la mi lta ba nyid kyis phyag dar khrod pa nyid la sogs pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan yang dag par len pa dang / sbyin pa la sogs pa'i khyad par bsgrubs pas de dag dang 'gal ba ser sna dang 'chal ba'i tshul khrims la sogs pa med pa dang /
translated: The six aspects of the practice of the transcendent perfections are as follows: By means of their pure roots of virtue, bodhisattvas are free of deceit in their minds and by not looking for gain and honor, they correctly take up the qualities of asceticism, such as wearing rags picked up from the rubbish.🔽By accomplishing the specific transcendent perfections such as generosity, they are free of such things as stinginess and immorality, which are incompatible with them.🔽By means of their perfect knowledge of all phenomena, they are endowed with the transcendent wisdom that is free of any contradiction with the nature of things.

original: chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa nyid kyis chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gro ba dang / 'gro ba bdag nyid kyis byas pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi don du dmyal ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba rnam pa drug dang /
analyzed: chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa nyid kyis chos nyid dang mi 'gal bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par 'gro ba dang / 'gro ba bdag nyid kyis byas pa nyid kyis gzhan gyi don du dmyal ba 'dod pa zhes bya ba rnam pa drug dang /
translated: And by means of their own actions, they are ready to go to the hells for the sake of other beings.

original: rtogs pa la yid ches pa'i chos nyid kyis gzhan gyis bkrir mi btub pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs shes pa la mkhas pa nyid kyis lam ltar bcos pa nye bar ston pa'i bdud la bdud nyid du rtogs pa zhes bya ba rnam pa gnyis dang /
analyzed: rtogs pa la yid ches pa'i chos nyid kyis gzhan gyis bkrir mi btub pa dang / sangs rgyas nyid kyi thabs shes pa la mkhas pa nyid kyis lam ltar bcos pa nye bar ston pa'i bdud la bdud nyid du rtogs pa zhes bya ba rnam pa gnyis dang /
translated: And through the Dharma of confidence in realization, they cannot be led astray by others. And through their skill in the means of buddhahood itself, they know that the demons who display false paths are demons. These are the two aspects.

original: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas spyod pa thams cad la sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba rnam pa gcig gis go rims bzhin du dro ba dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang / chos kyi mchog rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin par rtags nyi shu po 'di dag gis shes par bya'o nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'og tu
analyzed: 'khor gsum rnam par dag pas spyod pa thams cad la sangs rgyas dgyes pa zhes bya ba rnam pa gcig gis go rims bzhin du dro ba dang / rtse mo dang / bzod pa dang / chos kyi mchog rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin par rtags nyi shu po 'di dag gis shes par bya'o nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'og tu
translated: And through the purity of the three spheres, all their activities are what pleases the buddhas. These are the three aspects. In this way, it should be understood that the bodhisattvas who are abiding in the heat, peak, forbearance and supreme mundane state levels are irreversible from unsurpassable enlightenment through these twenty signs.

original: / mthong ba'i lam gyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis gsungs pa /
analyzed: / mthong ba'i lam gyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig gis gsungs pa /
translated: One verse in the middle summarizing the characteristics of irreversibility on the path of insight.

original: mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang // shes pa'i skad cig bcu drug ni //🔽byang chub sems dpa' mi ldog pa'i //
analyzed: mthong ba'i lam la bzod pa dang // shes pa'i skad cig bcu drug ni // byang chub sems dpa' mi ldog pa'i //
translated: 1. On the path of insight, the sixteen moments of acceptance and knowledge🔽are to be understood as the characteristics of the irreversible

original: mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya //🔽zhes bya ba gsungs te /🔽sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i sgo nas /🔽chos dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / shes pa'i skad cig ma bcu drug ni /
analyzed: mtshan nyid yin par shes par bya // zhes bya ba gsungs te / sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i bden pa'i sgo nas / chos dang rjes su shes pa'i bzod pa dang / shes pa'i skad cig ma bcu drug ni /
translated: bodhisattva.🔽The sixteen moments of the path of insight are the characteristics of the irreversible bodhisattva.

original: byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba'i lam la gnas pa rnams kyi phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid yin no //
translated: The sixteen moments are the four moments of acceptance and the four moments of knowledge with regard to the four truths, such as suffering, and the four subsequent moments of acceptance and the four subsequent moments of knowledge.

original: skad cig ma'i rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: skad cig ma'i rnam pa ci 'dra ba zhig mtshan nyid yin zhe na /
translated: What are the characteristics of the moments?

original: rnam pa rnams par skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa lngas gsungs pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa rnams par skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa lngas gsungs pa ni /
translated: Five verses on the aspects of the moments.

original: @116a * // gzugs sogs 'du shes ldog pa dang // sems brtan theg pa dman dag las //
analyzed: @116a * // gzugs sogs 'du shes ldog pa dang // sems brtan theg pa dman dag las //
translated: 2. The reversal of the notion of form, etc., the stability of mind, the lower vehicle,

original: rnam log bsam gtan la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: rnam log bsam gtan la sogs pa'i //
translated: The complete exhaustion of the branches of meditation and so on that are turned away from objects,

original: yan lag yongs su zad pa dang // lus sems yang ba nyid dang ni //
analyzed: yan lag yongs su zad pa dang // lus sems yang ba nyid dang ni //
translated: the lightness of body and mind,🔽the skill in means in the practice of desire,🔽the constant practice of pure conduct, the complete purity of livelihood,

original: 'dod la spyod la thabs mkhas dang // rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang // 'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid dang // phung sogs bar chad byed rnams dang // tshogs dang dbang sogs bcas pa yi //
analyzed: 'dod la spyod la thabs mkhas dang // rtag tu tshangs par spyod nyid dang // 'tsho ba rnam par dag nyid dang // phung sogs bar chad byed rnams dang // tshogs dang dbang sogs bcas pa yi //
translated: the complete abandonment of the aggregates and so on that are obstacles,

original: g-yul 'gyed ser sna la sogs la //
analyzed: g-yul 'gyed ser sna la sogs la //
translated: the gathering of the accumulations and so on,

original: sbyor dang rjes su sbyor ba yi //
analyzed: sbyor dang rjes su sbyor ba yi //
translated: the engagement in and subsequent engagement in🔽the individual rebirths in the battle with stinginess and so on,

original: gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang // chos ni rdul tsam mi dmigs nyid //
analyzed: gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang // chos ni rdul tsam mi dmigs nyid //
translated: the complete non-apprehension of even an atom of phenomena,

original: rang gi sa la nges pa nyid //
analyzed: rang gi sa la nges pa nyid //
translated: the certainty in one's own level,🔽the abiding in the three levels,

original: sa gsum la ni gnas pa dang // chos kyi don du srog gtong ba //
analyzed: sa gsum la ni gnas pa dang // chos kyi don du srog gtong ba //
translated: and the giving up of one's life for the sake of the Dharma.

original: de 'dra'i skad cig bcu drug ni //
analyzed: de 'dra'i skad cig bcu drug ni //
translated: Such are the sixteen moments

original: blo ldan mthong ba'i lam gnas kyi //
analyzed: blo ldan mthong ba'i lam gnas kyi //
translated: of the wise abiding on the path of seeing.

original: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dag yin //🔽zhes bya ba yin te /
analyzed: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags dag yin //🔽zhes bya ba yin te /
translated: They are the signs of irreversibility.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i chos su rtog pa las ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems brtan pa nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i chos khyad par can bsgrubs pas /
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyis gzugs la sogs pa'i chos su rtog pa las ldog pa dang / sangs rgyas la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs pas bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems brtan pa nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i chos khyad par can bsgrubs pas /
translated: Suffering is identityless, because it is identityless by nature.🔽The four aspects of the truth of origin are:🔽The origin of suffering is the cause, because it is the cause of the suffering of suffering and so on.🔽The origin of suffering is the origin, because it is the origin of the suffering of suffering and so on.🔽The origin of suffering is the strong generation, because it is the strong generation of the suffering of suffering and so on.🔽The origin of suffering is the strong production, because it is the strong production of the suffering of suffering and so on.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las sems rnam par log pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mthus bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs par skye ba'i yan lag yang dag par yongs su zad pa zhes bya ba bzhi ni sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las sems rnam par log pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i mthus bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sogs par skye ba'i yan lag yang dag par yongs su zad pa zhes bya ba bzhi ni sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa yin no //
translated: The four aspects of the truth of cessation are:🔽Cessation is the

original: mi dge ba dang bral ba nyid kyis lus dang sems yang ba dang / sems can gdul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mthus mngon par zhen pa med par 'dod pa la nye bar spyod pa dang / yul gyi nyes dmigs mthong bas rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa nyid dang /
analyzed: mi dge ba dang bral ba nyid kyis lus dang sems yang ba dang / sems can gdul ba'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mthus mngon par zhen pa med par 'dod pa la nye bar spyod pa dang / yul gyi nyes dmigs mthong bas rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa nyid dang /
translated: The four aspects of the origin of suffering are: lightness of body and mind due to being free from nonvirtue; enjoyment of sense objects without attachment due to the power of skill in the means of training sentient beings; always maintaining pure conduct due to seeing the faults of sense objects;

original: skyes bu dam pa'i chos nyid kyis 'tsho ba'i yo byad yang dag par rnam par dag pa nyid ces bya ba bzhi ni kun 'byung ba'i rnam pa yin no //
analyzed: skyes bu dam pa'i chos nyid kyis 'tsho ba'i yo byad yang dag par rnam par dag pa nyid ces bya ba bzhi ni kun 'byung ba'i rnam pa yin no //
translated: and complete purity of the requisites of livelihood due to the nature of holy beings.

original: stong pa nyid la gnas pa nyid kyis phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams rnams la sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba dag tu mi bya'o zhes /
analyzed: stong pa nyid la gnas pa nyid kyis phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams rnams la sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba dag tu mi bya'o zhes /
translated: One should not engage in or pursue the aggregates, sense bases, and elements by abiding in emptiness.

original: de ltar sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa @116b so sor bkag pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba nyid kyis rtogs pa'i bar chad byed pa'i tshogs rnams la snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang /
analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa @116b so sor bkag pa dang / mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal ba nyid kyis rtogs pa'i bar chad byed pa'i tshogs rnams la snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang /
translated: Thus, the four aspects of cessation are as follows:🔽Cessation of the individual states of preparation and subsequent preparation due to the elimination of the opposing factors.🔽Cessation of the individual states of preparation and subsequent preparation for the accumulations of enlightenment, such as generosity, due to the complete knowledge of the faults of conceptual thoughts.

original: rnam par rtog pa'i skyon yongs su shes pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi tshogs sbyin pa la sogs pa la snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gtam la gnas pa so sor bkag pa dang / gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag spang bar bya ba nyid kyis dbang po dang rten grong khyer la sogs pa'i g-yul 'gyed pa snga ma bzhin du sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba'i gnas pa rjes su bkag pa zhes bya ba bzhi ni 'gog pa'i rnam pa yin
